005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.smartdashboard;
006
007import edu.wpi.first.networktables.BooleanArrayPublisher;
008import edu.wpi.first.networktables.BooleanArraySubscriber;
009import edu.wpi.first.networktables.BooleanArrayTopic;
010import edu.wpi.first.networktables.BooleanPublisher;
011import edu.wpi.first.networktables.BooleanSubscriber;
012import edu.wpi.first.networktables.BooleanTopic;
013import edu.wpi.first.networktables.DoubleArrayPublisher;
014import edu.wpi.first.networktables.DoubleArraySubscriber;
015import edu.wpi.first.networktables.DoubleArrayTopic;
016import edu.wpi.first.networktables.DoublePublisher;
017import edu.wpi.first.networktables.DoubleSubscriber;
018import edu.wpi.first.networktables.DoubleTopic;
019import edu.wpi.first.networktables.FloatArrayPublisher;
020import edu.wpi.first.networktables.FloatArraySubscriber;
021import edu.wpi.first.networktables.FloatArrayTopic;
022import edu.wpi.first.networktables.FloatPublisher;
023import edu.wpi.first.networktables.FloatSubscriber;
024import edu.wpi.first.networktables.FloatTopic;
025import edu.wpi.first.networktables.IntegerArrayPublisher;
026import edu.wpi.first.networktables.IntegerArraySubscriber;
027import edu.wpi.first.networktables.IntegerArrayTopic;
028import edu.wpi.first.networktables.IntegerPublisher;
029import edu.wpi.first.networktables.IntegerSubscriber;
030import edu.wpi.first.networktables.IntegerTopic;
031import edu.wpi.first.networktables.NTSendableBuilder;
032import edu.wpi.first.networktables.NetworkTable;
033import edu.wpi.first.networktables.Publisher;
034import edu.wpi.first.networktables.RawPublisher;
035import edu.wpi.first.networktables.RawSubscriber;
036import edu.wpi.first.networktables.RawTopic;
037import edu.wpi.first.networktables.StringArrayPublisher;
038import edu.wpi.first.networktables.StringArraySubscriber;
039import edu.wpi.first.networktables.StringArrayTopic;
040import edu.wpi.first.networktables.StringPublisher;
041import edu.wpi.first.networktables.StringSubscriber;
042import edu.wpi.first.networktables.StringTopic;
043import edu.wpi.first.networktables.Subscriber;
044import edu.wpi.first.networktables.Topic;
045import edu.wpi.first.util.WPIUtilJNI;
046import edu.wpi.first.util.function.BooleanConsumer;
047import edu.wpi.first.util.function.FloatConsumer;
048import edu.wpi.first.util.function.FloatSupplier;
049import java.util.ArrayList;
050import java.util.List;
051import java.util.function.BooleanSupplier;
052import java.util.function.Consumer;
053import java.util.function.DoubleConsumer;
054import java.util.function.DoubleSupplier;
055import java.util.function.LongConsumer;
056import java.util.function.LongSupplier;
057import java.util.function.Supplier;
058
059public class SendableBuilderImpl implements NTSendableBuilder {
060  @FunctionalInterface
061  private interface TimedConsumer<T> {
062    void accept(T value, long time);
063  }
064
065  private static class Property<P extends Publisher, S extends Subscriber>
066      implements AutoCloseable {
067    @Override
068    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidCatchingGenericException")
069    public void close() {
070      try {
071        if (m_pub != null) {
072          m_pub.close();
073        }
074        if (m_sub != null) {
075          m_sub.close();
076        }
077      } catch (Exception e) {
078        // ignore
079      }
080    }
081
082    void update(boolean controllable, long time) {
083      if (controllable && m_sub != null && m_updateLocal != null) {
084        m_updateLocal.accept(m_sub);
085      }
086      if (m_pub != null && m_updateNetwork != null) {
087        m_updateNetwork.accept(m_pub, time);
088      }
089    }
090
091    P m_pub;
092    S m_sub;
093    TimedConsumer<P> m_updateNetwork;
094    Consumer<S> m_updateLocal;
095  }
096
097  private final List<Property<?, ?>> m_properties = new ArrayList<>();
098  private Runnable m_safeState;
099  private final List<Runnable> m_updateTables = new ArrayList<>();
100  private NetworkTable m_table;
101  private boolean m_controllable;
102  private boolean m_actuator;
103
104  private BooleanPublisher m_controllablePub;
105  private StringPublisher m_typePub;
106  private BooleanPublisher m_actuatorPub;
107
108  private final List<AutoCloseable> m_closeables = new ArrayList<>();
109
110  @Override
111  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidCatchingGenericException")
112  public void close() {
113    if (m_controllablePub != null) {
114      m_controllablePub.close();
115    }
116    if (m_typePub != null) {
117      m_typePub.close();
118    }
119    if (m_actuatorPub != null) {
120      m_actuatorPub.close();
121    }
122    for (Property<?, ?> property : m_properties) {
123      property.close();
124    }
125    for (AutoCloseable closeable : m_closeables) {
126      try {
127        closeable.close();
128      } catch (Exception e) {
129        // ignore
130      }
131    }
132  }
133
134  /**
135   * Set the network table. Must be called prior to any Add* functions being called.
136   *
137   * @param table Network table
138   */
139  public void setTable(NetworkTable table) {
140    m_table = table;
141    m_controllablePub = table.getBooleanTopic(".controllable").publish();
142    m_controllablePub.setDefault(false);
143  }
144
145  /**
146   * Get the network table.
147   *
148   * @return The network table
149   */
150  @Override
151  public NetworkTable getTable() {
152    return m_table;
153  }
154
155  /**
156   * Return whether this sendable has an associated table.
157   *
158   * @return True if it has a table, false if not.
159   */
160  @Override
161  public boolean isPublished() {
162    return m_table != null;
163  }
164
165  /**
166   * Return whether this sendable should be treated as an actuator.
167   *
168   * @return True if actuator, false if not.
169   */
170  public boolean isActuator() {
171    return m_actuator;
172  }
173
174  /** Update the network table values by calling the getters for all properties. */
175  @Override
176  public void update() {
177    long time = WPIUtilJNI.now();
178    for (Property<?, ?> property : m_properties) {
179      property.update(m_controllable, time);
180    }
181    for (Runnable updateTable : m_updateTables) {
182      updateTable.run();
183    }
184  }
185
186  /** Hook setters for all properties. */
187  public void startListeners() {
188    m_controllable = true;
189    if (m_controllablePub != null) {
190      m_controllablePub.set(true);
191    }
192  }
193
194  /** Unhook setters for all properties. */
195  public void stopListeners() {
196    m_controllable = false;
197    if (m_controllablePub != null) {
198      m_controllablePub.set(false);
199    }
200  }
201
202  /**
203   * Start LiveWindow mode by hooking the setters for all properties. Also calls the safeState
204   * function if one was provided.
205   */
206  public void startLiveWindowMode() {
207    if (m_safeState != null) {
208      m_safeState.run();
209    }
210    startListeners();
211  }
212
213  /**
214   * Stop LiveWindow mode by unhooking the setters for all properties. Also calls the safeState
215   * function if one was provided.
216   */
217  public void stopLiveWindowMode() {
218    stopListeners();
219    if (m_safeState != null) {
220      m_safeState.run();
221    }
222  }
223
224  /** Clear properties. */
225  @Override
226  public void clearProperties() {
227    stopListeners();
228    for (Property<?, ?> property : m_properties) {
229      property.close();
230    }
231    m_properties.clear();
232  }
233
234  @Override
235  public void addCloseable(AutoCloseable closeable) {
236    m_closeables.add(closeable);
237  }
238
239  /**
240   * Set the string representation of the named data type that will be used by the smart dashboard
241   * for this sendable.
242   *
243   * @param type data type
244   */
245  @Override
246  public void setSmartDashboardType(String type) {
247    if (m_typePub == null) {
248      m_typePub = m_table.getStringTopic(".type").publish();
249    }
250    m_typePub.set(type);
251  }
252
253  /**
254   * Set a flag indicating if this sendable should be treated as an actuator. By default this flag
255   * is false.
256   *
257   * @param value true if actuator, false if not
258   */
259  @Override
260  public void setActuator(boolean value) {
261    if (m_actuatorPub == null) {
262      m_actuatorPub = m_table.getBooleanTopic(".actuator").publish();
263    }
264    m_actuatorPub.set(value);
265    m_actuator = value;
266  }
267
268  /**
269   * Set the function that should be called to set the Sendable into a safe state. This is called
270   * when entering and exiting Live Window mode.
271   *
272   * @param func function
273   */
274  @Override
275  public void setSafeState(Runnable func) {
276    m_safeState = func;
277  }
278
279  /**
280   * Set the function that should be called to update the network table for things other than
281   * properties. Note this function is not passed the network table object; instead it should use
282   * the topics returned by getTopic().
283   *
284   * @param func function
285   */
286  @Override
287  public void setUpdateTable(Runnable func) {
288    m_updateTables.add(func);
289  }
290
291  /**
292   * Add a property without getters or setters. This can be used to get entry handles for the
293   * function called by setUpdateTable().
294   *
295   * @param key property name
296   * @return Network table entry
297   */
298  @Override
299  public Topic getTopic(String key) {
300    return m_table.getTopic(key);
301  }
302
303  /**
304   * Add a boolean property.
305   *
306   * @param key property name
307   * @param getter getter function (returns current value)
308   * @param setter setter function (sets new value)
309   */
310  @Override
311  public void addBooleanProperty(String key, BooleanSupplier getter, BooleanConsumer setter) {
312    Property<BooleanPublisher, BooleanSubscriber> property = new Property<>();
313    BooleanTopic topic = m_table.getBooleanTopic(key);
314    if (getter != null) {
315      property.m_pub = topic.publish();
316      property.m_updateNetwork = (pub, time) -> pub.set(getter.getAsBoolean(), time);
317    }
318    if (setter != null) {
319      property.m_sub = topic.subscribe(false);
320      property.m_updateLocal =
321          sub -> {
322            for (boolean val : sub.readQueueValues()) {
323              setter.accept(val);
324            }
325          };
326    }
327    m_properties.add(property);
328  }
329
330  /**
331   * Add an integer property.
332   *
333   * @param key property name
334   * @param getter getter function (returns current value)
335   * @param setter setter function (sets new value)
336   */
337  @Override
338  public void addIntegerProperty(String key, LongSupplier getter, LongConsumer setter) {
339    Property<IntegerPublisher, IntegerSubscriber> property = new Property<>();
340    IntegerTopic topic = m_table.getIntegerTopic(key);
341    if (getter != null) {
342      property.m_pub = topic.publish();
343      property.m_updateNetwork = (pub, time) -> pub.set(getter.getAsLong(), time);
344    }
345    if (setter != null) {
346      property.m_sub = topic.subscribe(0);
347      property.m_updateLocal =
348          sub -> {
349            for (long val : sub.readQueueValues()) {
350              setter.accept(val);
351            }
352          };
353    }
354    m_properties.add(property);
355  }
356
357  /**
358   * Add a float property.
359   *
360   * @param key property name
361   * @param getter getter function (returns current value)
362   * @param setter setter function (sets new value)
363   */
364  @Override
365  public void addFloatProperty(String key, FloatSupplier getter, FloatConsumer setter) {
366    Property<FloatPublisher, FloatSubscriber> property = new Property<>();
367    FloatTopic topic = m_table.getFloatTopic(key);
368    if (getter != null) {
369      property.m_pub = topic.publish();
370      property.m_updateNetwork = (pub, time) -> pub.set(getter.getAsFloat(), time);
371    }
372    if (setter != null) {
373      property.m_sub = topic.subscribe(0.0f);
374      property.m_updateLocal =
375          sub -> {
376            for (float val : sub.readQueueValues()) {
377              setter.accept(val);
378            }
379          };
380    }
381    m_properties.add(property);
382  }
383
384  /**
385   * Add a double property.
386   *
387   * @param key property name
388   * @param getter getter function (returns current value)
389   * @param setter setter function (sets new value)
390   */
391  @Override
392  public void addDoubleProperty(String key, DoubleSupplier getter, DoubleConsumer setter) {
393    Property<DoublePublisher, DoubleSubscriber> property = new Property<>();
394    DoubleTopic topic = m_table.getDoubleTopic(key);
395    if (getter != null) {
396      property.m_pub = topic.publish();
397      property.m_updateNetwork = (pub, time) -> pub.set(getter.getAsDouble(), time);
398    }
399    if (setter != null) {
400      property.m_sub = topic.subscribe(0.0);
401      property.m_updateLocal =
402          sub -> {
403            for (double val : sub.readQueueValues()) {
404              setter.accept(val);
405            }
406          };
407    }
408    m_properties.add(property);
409  }
410
411  /**
412   * Add a string property.
413   *
414   * @param key property name
415   * @param getter getter function (returns current value)
416   * @param setter setter function (sets new value)
417   */
418  @Override
419  public void addStringProperty(String key, Supplier<String> getter, Consumer<String> setter) {
420    Property<StringPublisher, StringSubscriber> property = new Property<>();
421    StringTopic topic = m_table.getStringTopic(key);
422    if (getter != null) {
423      property.m_pub = topic.publish();
424      property.m_updateNetwork = (pub, time) -> pub.set(getter.get(), time);
425    }
426    if (setter != null) {
427      property.m_sub = topic.subscribe("");
428      property.m_updateLocal =
429          sub -> {
430            for (String val : sub.readQueueValues()) {
431              setter.accept(val);
432            }
433          };
434    }
435    m_properties.add(property);
436  }
437
438  /**
439   * Add a boolean array property.
440   *
441   * @param key property name
442   * @param getter getter function (returns current value)
443   * @param setter setter function (sets new value)
444   */
445  @Override
446  public void addBooleanArrayProperty(
447      String key, Supplier<boolean[]> getter, Consumer<boolean[]> setter) {
448    Property<BooleanArrayPublisher, BooleanArraySubscriber> property = new Property<>();
449    BooleanArrayTopic topic = m_table.getBooleanArrayTopic(key);
450    if (getter != null) {
451      property.m_pub = topic.publish();
452      property.m_updateNetwork = (pub, time) -> pub.set(getter.get(), time);
453    }
454    if (setter != null) {
455      property.m_sub = topic.subscribe(new boolean[] {});
456      property.m_updateLocal =
457          sub -> {
458            for (boolean[] val : sub.readQueueValues()) {
459              setter.accept(val);
460            }
461          };
462    }
463    m_properties.add(property);
464  }
465
466  /**
467   * Add an integer array property.
468   *
469   * @param key property name
470   * @param getter getter function (returns current value)
471   * @param setter setter function (sets new value)
472   */
473  @Override
474  public void addIntegerArrayProperty(
475      String key, Supplier<long[]> getter, Consumer<long[]> setter) {
476    Property<IntegerArrayPublisher, IntegerArraySubscriber> property = new Property<>();
477    IntegerArrayTopic topic = m_table.getIntegerArrayTopic(key);
478    if (getter != null) {
479      property.m_pub = topic.publish();
480      property.m_updateNetwork = (pub, time) -> pub.set(getter.get(), time);
481    }
482    if (setter != null) {
483      property.m_sub = topic.subscribe(new long[] {});
484      property.m_updateLocal =
485          sub -> {
486            for (long[] val : sub.readQueueValues()) {
487              setter.accept(val);
488            }
489          };
490    }
491    m_properties.add(property);
492  }

507      property.m_pub = topic.publish();
508      property.m_updateNetwork = (pub, time) -> pub.set(getter.get(), time);
509    }
510    if (setter != null) {
511      property.m_sub = topic.subscribe(new float[] {});
512      property.m_updateLocal =
513          sub -> {
514            for (float[] val : sub.readQueueValues()) {
515              setter.accept(val);
516            }
517          };
518    }
519    m_properties.add(property);
520  }

537    }
538    if (setter != null) {

544            }
545          };

550  /**
551   * Add a string array property.
552   *
553   * @param key property name
554   * @param getter getter function (returns current value)
555   * @param setter setter function (sets new value)
556   */
557  @Override
558  public void addStringArrayProperty(
559      String key, Supplier<String[]> getter, Consumer<String[]> setter) {
560    Property<StringArrayPublisher, StringArraySubscriber> property = new Property<>();
561    StringArrayTopic topic = m_table.getStringArrayTopic(key);
562    if (getter != null) {
563      property.m_pub = topic.publish();
564      property.m_updateNetwork = (pub, time) -> pub.set(getter.get(), time);
565    }
566    if (setter != null) {
567      property.m_sub = topic.subscribe(new String[] {});
568      property.m_updateLocal =
569          sub -> {
570            for (String[] val : sub.readQueueValues()) {
571              setter.accept(val);
572            }
573          };
574    }
575    m_properties.add(property);
576  }
577
578  /**
579   * Add a raw property.
580   *
581   * @param key property name
582   * @param typeString type string
583   * @param getter getter function (returns current value)
584   * @param setter setter function (sets new value)
585   */
586  @Override
587  public void addRawProperty(
588      String key, String typeString, Supplier<byte[]> getter, Consumer<byte[]> setter) {
589    Property<RawPublisher, RawSubscriber> property = new Property<>();
590    RawTopic topic = m_table.getRawTopic(key);
591    if (getter != null) {
592      property.m_pub = topic.publish(typeString);
593      property.m_updateNetwork = (pub, time) -> pub.set(getter.get(), time);
594    }
595    if (setter != null) {
596      property.m_sub = topic.subscribe(typeString, new byte[] {});
597      property.m_updateLocal =
598          sub -> {
599            for (byte[] val : sub.readQueueValues()) {
600              setter.accept(val);
601            }
602          };
603    }
604    m_properties.add(property);
605  }
606}
